17 class Fifo_attr {
18  friend class Fifo;
19 public:
20  Fifo_attr(){ memset(&attr_, 0, sizeof(attr_)); }
21  uint32_t used() const { return attr_.used; }
22  uint32_t size() const { return attr_.size; }
23  bool overflow() const { return attr_.overflow != 0; }
24 private:
25  fifo_attr_t attr_;
26 };
